1534891163_1EAD2zXkzgJf6M7xQ4jG5FHCxUTez.body:
Hi, @D14na: please update your proxy's zeronet to the newest version, so, we can use your proxy as a tracker/super peer.
`?zeronet_peers=0net.io:24342`

> [d14na2](#comment_3_1EoqbSwvxRuRKj7vpeK79wuGXdpq2wbqfM): @pad just updated the proxy to 0.6.3. [...]

Your proxy host a lot of zites, so it is a super peer.
Update to the newest zeronet client, other user can use `zeronet_peers= your proxy ip :port` , they can open all zites you proxy host without other tracker. So it is a tracker.
In mainland China, all default trackers are blocked. we can easily open zites by use `zeronet_peers` parameter.
By the way, what is your proxy's IP, is it a pubilc and  fixed IP ?
